column8:
This t-shirt admires the famous Volkswagen Kombi campers -also known as the "microbus", "minibus" or "hippie van" they are loved by their owners and are still going strong 50 years after initial production. It  spawned many imitators, but none reached the cult status of the VW kombi.

This shirt announces that you are a VW Camper Fan - wear it with pride!
column21: One of a wonderful series of t shirts celebrating the VolksWagen, or VW, in all its guises over the years. A classic and stalwart of design and engineering, it's one of the most popular brand of cars today. Show it your admiration with a t shirt from weadmire.net.
